amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Section 8132 of the bill which relates to a prohibition on use of funds with respect to any nondeployed status of Minuteman III ballistic missiles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 233 (Roll no. 320).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 233 (Roll no. 320).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Nadler.
